name: cilium
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
one of the very small parts like hairs on the surface of a cell that move regularly and keep the surrounding liquid moving around it or help an organism with only one cell to move
STEVE GSCHMEISSNER/SPL/Science Photo Library/GettyImages
